item.description:
• Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

    This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and event scenes in Providence.

    This week's location is: Mile and A Quarter!!!!

    Okay, so this location is where the old Barnsiders "used to be", but really that's been gone so long I don't think it really counts, but let's just mention it for old times sake. If you've been paying attention to the S Water Street area, you might have noticed that they've been preparing to open for a few months now......at long last, the time is here and they opened last week!!!

    I popped in the other night to check it out and wow - it seems like aÂ  great new addition to neighborhood! The bar and lounge area are spacious and comfortable, the drink selection is great and the food looks good too. With a decor of warm, neutral contemporary leather and dark wood, the bar/lounge area in the front of the restaurant is perfect for a casual cocktail after work and for a nice dinner, the more intimate dining room over looking the river is perfect. They even have a small bar in the dining are for those interested in a little quieter setting then the lounge. Overall, I was very impressed!

    So, here we go on our first NEW RESTAURANT ALERT Monday Night Meetup, and let's check it out!!!

    Hope to see you there!

    Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the brown and pink scarf in my picture, but we're hard to miss and very friendly!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Mile and a Quarter! NEW RESTAURANT ALERT!!!!
